clauses.title: Service Level Agreement (SLA)
clauses.summary: Guarantees 99.9% uptime with service credits for failures.

clauses.title: Indemnification
clauses.summary: Mutual indemnification for third-party claims arising from breaches.

clauses.title: Price Adjustments
clauses.summary: Provider may adjust pricing annually with 30 days notice.

clauses.title: Governing Law
clauses.summary: The agreement is governed by the laws of the State of Delaware.

insights.message: Liability cap explicitly excludes costs related to data breaches, posing significant financial risk.
The annual price adjustment clause lacks a cap, allowing for potentially large and unpredictable cost increases.

evidence.snippet: The limitations on liability set forth in Section 9.2 shall not apply to breaches of confidentiality (Section 6), indemnification obligations (Section 8), or any liability arising from a data breach caused by the gross negligence of a party.
Provider reserves the right to modify the fees for the Services, effective upon thirty (30) days' prior written notice to Customer.
